content: this legal case involves a dispute over the coownership of a real estate property the case lasted for 1 year and 5 months and resulted in the dissolution of the coownership one party identified as i ć p doo was awarded 8144 parts of the property while the petitioners m v i ž were also awarded equal shares the petitioners m v i ž were ordered to pay p m doo an amount of 21672 the court has authorized p m doo to mortgage the properties and register this mortgage in the land registry the court has also authorized the petitioners m v i ž to register their coownership rights the court has ordered p m doo to pay the petitioners for procedural costs the decision is based on the property act and various agreements and documents provided by the parties the court has considered objections and appeals raised by the counterparty but ultimately determined that the conditions for the dissolution of coownership and payment have been fulfilled the court has suspended the proceedings and ordered the counterparty to reimburse the petitioners for the costs of the proceedings the court confirms the contested decision in its entirety
